| 20-18    | Give as many examples as you can for how adidas defies the common social criticisms of marketing. |
| 20-19    | Of the five sustainable marketing principles discussed in the text, which one best describes adidas’s approach? |
| 20-20    | Analyze adidas’s business according to the Societal Classification of Products (Figure 20.4). |
| 20-21    | Would adidas be more financially successful if it were not so focused on social responsibility? Explain. |
summary_markdown: This content presents a series of analytical questions related to Adidas's marketing practices and social responsibility. The questions prompt an examination of how Adidas counters common criticisms of marketing, identification of the most applicable sustainable marketing principle to their strategy, and an analysis of their business model using the Societal Classification of Products framework. Additionally, a question probes the potential financial implications of Adidas's strong focus on social responsibility. The overall structure is comparative and analytical, requiring the application of marketing concepts to a specific company case.
